application.name: Cisco Amazon Kindle Fire Demo
application.description:
Versions:
* Version 0.9.10 :: Added (FEATURE) YouTube Support. Added (FEATURE) Title Page image with delay before showing the Presentation Menu. Added (FEATURE) System Keep Alive support - automatic keep alive when showing videos or optional for the whole Presentation or tab by tab basis. Added (FEATURE) Display Auto-Rotation support - allows for Portrait Mode Presentations. Fixed (ISSUE) Choosing Top does not hide the NavBar. Fixed (ISSUE) Top should be renamed to [Menu]. Fixed (ISSUE) Showing/Hiding NavBar should resize the currently playing asset. (Resize the height by the NavBar height) (ISSUE) Alternate YouTube Video ID is not working. (ISSUE) Top Image for a Presentation is not being shown.
* Version 0.9.9 :: Fixed (ISSUE) Item Navigation is now back in the main displayable area when requested. Added (FEATURE) Ability to goto and play from any Item via the (*) Nav Menu Item.
* Version 0.9.8 :: Fixed (ISSUE) The in-app device menu item "Version" should only appear when viewing the "Top" menu of Tabs. ** Press the device menu, look for the menu item with the Label "Top" and tap it. You can view the Version lablel on the Title Bar.
* Version 0.9.7 :: Fixed (ISSUE) The in-app device menu item that was called "Menu" is now called "Top". ** Press the device menu, look for the menu item with the Label "Top" and tap it. You can view the Change Log and Activity Log from the Main Menu.
* Version 0.9.6 :: Validated (ISSUE) Activity Log and Change Log do not appear when viewing a presentation however they do appear after pressing the Menu in-app device menu item. ** Press the device menu, look for the menu item with the Label "Menu" and tap it. You can view the Change Log and Activity Log from the Main Menu.
* Version 0.9.5 :: Added (FEATURE) Show the Version Info on the Application Title Bar for 5 seconds via in-app device menu. ** Validated functionality of in-app device menu.
* Version 0.9.4 :: Fixed (ISSUE) Top of 1024x600 images are cropped, etc. ** There is an area at the bottom of the Kindle Fire display used by Amazon for the device menu - this area cannot be removed however it will crop images that are 1024x600.
* Version 0.9.3 :: Fixed (ISSUE) Cannot display an image measuring 1024x600 without cropping. ** 1024x600 images can now be used however the device menu is being used for navigation.
* Version 0.9.2 :: Fixed (ISSUE) .JPG images do not look the same as .PNG images. <option BitmapScaleMode="STRETCH"/> <!-- BitmapScaleMode can be one of the following (only for .JPG): STRETCH or LETTERBOX, default is STRETCH if not otherwise stated. -->
* Version 0.9.1 :: Fixed (ISSUE) Device Menu for the App now shows the Exit option enabled. Fixed (ISSUE) App Title Bar can be managed via the XML file. <root title="Put any message here you want on the app title bar"> </root> Fixed (ISSUE) When the Nav bar is shown, clicking on a navigation button hides the nav bar - the nav bar should explicitly remain until it's toggled off. <root title=""> <item> <navbar autohide="true"/> <!-- value for autohide can be true or false or a number of milliseconds to delay --> </item> </root> Fixed (BUG) When HotSpot target is missing the next item will be displayed when the HotSpot is tapped. ** Previous behavior was that nothing was done for an item when the HotSpot target was not found. Fixed (ISSUE) Cannot proceed to the next item when there is one or more HotSpots and the user taps anywhere other than one of the HotSpots.
* Version 0.8.0 :: Fixed (BUG) .JPG/.PNG requires a sound file - fixed !!! Fixed (BUG) Make 1024x600 image look as it should on the Kindle FIre... aspect ratio and scale options !!! Fixed (BUG) The app should be able to display an image at native resolution (1024x600) full screen. ** Sound files via the <play> tag is not required. Fixed (BUG) Ability to show images in sequence without the need for an audio file. ** Landscape Display Mode Only. ** Added Option to Tab Item as follows: (Use the settings that work for your needs...) <option maintainAspectRatio="false" scaleContent="true"/> <option maintainAspectRatio="true" scaleContent="false"/> <option maintainAspectRatio="true" scaleContent="true"/> <option maintainAspectRatio="false" scaleContent="false"/> ** Added Missing Image whenever there is no <play> and no <source> are specified or the specified files are missing... HotSpots do not appear when the Missing Image is displayed. .MP3 files will play even when Missing Image is displayed. FIXED (BUG) Ability to hide / toggle the apps navigation bar. ** Device Menu item shows/hides the App Nav Bar. Apps Nav Bar hides 5 seconds after being shown or when a nav bar button is tapped. FIXED (BUG) Ability to hide / toggle the hotspots. ** Device Menu item shows/hides the HotSpots. HotSpots hide 5 seconds after being shown or when a HotSpot is tapped. ** Malformed XML files can cause unexpected problems... this is to be expected. * Version 0.7.5 :: Runtime Activity Window. View the history of messages. * Version 0.7.0 :: Interactive Item Editor. Edit each item interactively. * Version 0.6.0 :: Interactive HotSpot Editor. Add, Remove, Move and Resize HotSpots.
Useful Apps that can support the use of this App: ** Get Memory Booster Ad-Free from the Amazon Appstore... http://amzn.to/pGZ29O ** Useful for clearing this App from memory in case it remains in memory after use. ** Get File Manager from the Amazon Appstore... http://amzn.to/kMymiV ** Useful for exploring files and folders and allows the Activity Log to be read in what could be a more convenient manner.
(Click the "x" in the upper right of this window to dismiss this dialog...)
